events.name: Campaign Spotlight: After School Satan Club
events.description: Join ASSC Campaign Director June Everett as we discuss everything After School Satan Club! A brief history, current and future updates, volunteer requirements, and a Q&A to help answer all of your questions.

events.name: Tales from the Dork Side!
events.description: Join Vyvyan des Esseintesas they read a series of spooky stories and terrifying tales. Pull up a chair, get into something cozy, and pour a goblet of your favorite ghoulish beverage as you enter their li-boo-rary.

events.name: Tom The Witch's Neighborhood
events.description: Join our favorite tour guide Thomas O'Brien Vallor to chat about Salem and the most wonderful time of the year, Halloween.

events.name: Halloween Benediction by Minister Neacail MacGille-Eathain
events.description: Benedictions explore the spirit of their respective holidays. Benedictions for Satanic holiday events focus people's attention on the religious importance of the holiday. They are a performance as much as they are a declaration, creating a feeling of religious connection and meaning.

events.name: SOBER FACTION FRIGHT NIGHT PRE-HALLOWEEN EVENT!
events.description: Join us for spooky Sobramily fun, games, stories, and more during this most Holy of Unholy event! Make sure to masquerade and dress for the occasion! Hail Halloween!

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy with DJ Mercy Maelica
events.description: Join Mercy, our veteran performer and Resident DJ for music and videos live from Salem.
